about_the_game:
Bounty is a brutal top-down action RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world populated by blobs.

Movement is the Key to Your Survival!l



Engage in fast-paced and brutal combat that will put your reflexes to the test. There are hundreds of weapons and items for you to equip and experiment with! Each has its own stats, special effects, and stat scalings. The sky is truly the limit.

Want to equip a shield and dive deep into the mix? Bet.

Do you want to dual-wield rakes and clear out your enemies like a pile of leaves? Go for it.

Could you wield a katana in one hand and throw footballs with the other? Absolutely.

Carnage with friends


Players can team up with their friends (or even strangers) to explore the world and play through the campaign.

Explore a dangerous and unpredictable world!


New discoveries and challenges lurk around every corner.

With great danger comes great rewards!


Defeat enemies to earn powerful randomized loot drops that will let you customize every aspect of your character.

Fight to the death!


Jump into the Smasher Arena to test out your prowess in PvP combat!

content_descriptors.notes: Bounty contains cartoon violence and copious amounts of unrealistic blood.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Bounty is a fast-paced and brutal top-down action MMORPG set in a post-apocalyptic world populated by humanoid blobs. As a fresh spawn, all you know about the world around you is what was pre-programmed at your creation. It's up to you to find your way (and your meaning) in this strange world.
